page.title: 01A LOOK AT BLACKRIDGE
page.content:
{ }Blackridge is a small village halfway between {GLASGOW}and { {EDINBURGH.}Blackridge is a ribbon type village approximately 1.5 kilometres long. There are a few shops and some recreational facilities. 2 kilometres south of Blackridge lies the {M8}motorway at Harthill. ............
In the last century Blackridge was an important{mining community. Evidence of this still remains. Another industry in Blackridge is the {Quarry. }Much of the rolling countryside around Blackridge is used for rough grazing for dairy cows.
